page.title: 15RELIGION
page.content: {CHURCHES, CHRISTIAN, NON-CHRISTIAN. { {CHURCHES :}THERE ARE SEVEN CHURCHES IN OUR AREA(3 CHURCH OF SCOTLAND, 1 CATHOLIC, 1 EPISCOPAL, 1 BAPTIST AND 1 CHURCH OF CHRIST). ALL THESE ARE MODERN BUILDINGS, THE OLDEST BEING 30 YEARS OLD. {CHRISTIAN :}THE MAIN RELIGION IS THE CHRISTIAN RELIGION, BUT FEWER AND FEWER PEOPLE ACTUALLY ATTEND CHURCH ON A REGULAR BASIS OR PRACTISE THEIR BELIEFS. {NON-CHRISTIAN :}NON-CHRISTIAN GROUPS e.g. MORMONS, JEHOVAH'S WITNESSES, MOSLEMS ETC., ARE MINORITY GROUPS AND WOULD MEET IN SMALL HALLS OR PRIVATE HOUSES. THESE MINOR RELIGIONS ARE GENERALLY BETTER SUPPORTED BY THEIR MEMBERS THAN THE CHRISTIAN CHURCHES.
